Name: Maze
About the game: Maze is a short psychedelic experience. Run and fight enemies in randomly generated levels. Features: Minimalistic retro visuals inspired by Tron and CGA graphics. Dynamic soundtrack arranged to accompany non-stop play Fast-paced fights Random level generation
